about.title: ABOUT FLIZBAR
about.subtitle: Learn more about us
about.text: At Flizbar, we are committed to transforming the way you approach your investments. Combining cutting-edge technology and the expertise of our equity experts, we offer comprehensive solutions to simplify and enhance your financial resources.

first.title: Who we are
first.textFirst: With over 30 years of experience in equity, our team brings a wealth of knowledge and insights to the table.
first.textSecond: Our founders, analysts and advisors are renowned professionals in the field and have dedicated their lives to understanding the markets and the people who invest in them.

second.title: Our mission
second.textFirst: To lead our clients to achieve sustainable financial growth through solid, ethical, and transparent investment strategies. Our commitment is to generate real value, with responsibility and integrity, always putting our clients' interests first.

third.title: Our vision
third.textFirst: To be globally recognized as a Hedge Fund that revolutionized the financial market, proving that it is possible to achieve high performance without compromising ethics, transparency, and genuine commitment to the well-being of investors and society.

fourth.text: Ready to transform the way you invest? Count on us.

journey.title: A journey of a thousand kilometers must begin with
journey.text: Flizbar became a hedge fund in 2021, after 18 years of experience in the financial market of its main manager. The group was created with a focus on qualified investors and partner companies, its main objective is to align growth and risk in a sustainable way. Our experts contribute to the generation of wealth with necessary and categorical information.

know.title: ABOUT FLIZBAR
know.subtitle: Get to Know Us Better
know.presentationText: At Flizbar, we are dedicated to transforming the way you approach your investments. By combining cutting-edge technology with the expertise of our specialists in variable income, we offer comprehensive solutions to simplify and enhance your financial resources.
know.firstCardText: With over 30 years of experience in variable income, our team brings a wealth of knowledge and insights to the table.
know.firstCardSecondText: Our founders, analysts, and advisors are renowned professionals in the field who have dedicated their lives to understanding the markets and the people who invest in them.
know.secondCardText: Flizbar's mission is clear: to provide exceptional and transparent service that helps investors achieve their financial goals, whether you are a novice trader or a high-income investor.
know.secondCardSecondText: We aim to help you truly enjoy your financial freedom.
know.thirdCardText: We are committed to offering long-term services to our clients, always seeking the best alternatives for wealth preservation and growth.
know.thirdCardSecondText: We are restless and innovative, striving to translate this into solutions for you. But most importantly, we are committed to you and your financial success.
know.lastText: Ready to transform your investment approach? Count on us.

first.title: Treasury
first.text: These are countries' debt securities. Considered the safest fixed income investments of any country due to the government's ability to “roll over the debt”, that is, unlike people, the government can (according to its credibility in the market, among other factors) make new loans to cover old ones whenever necessary, as in the case of the USA, for example, which has a debt of more than 20 trillion dollars that increases whenever necessary

second.title: Commodities
second.text: These are non-industrialized products, such as: wheat; soybeans, sugar; cotton; oil; gold, among others, which end up having the same consumption purpose regardless of the country of origin of these products, so their price is the same anywhere in the world through global supply and demand

third.title: Actions
third.text: It is a part of the share capital of a company, its holder to a certain extent becomes a partner of the company to which the share belongs, it is a means normally used to leverage the growth of a company that, with the sale of shares, many Sometimes it applies the capital gained to increase its operations, capacity, quality, etc.

fourth.title: Options
fourth.text: These are tools used in the stock market to protect financial investments and even expand profits. Their purpose is to minimize risks, since options guarantee a purchase or sale price for a share in the future.

fifth.title: Indices
fifth.text: These are instruments that bring together the main shares of companies listed on the stock exchanges, whether by size, area of ​​activity, sector, etc. They are used to monitor the movement of the stock exchange or the area analyzed to point out the direction for where companies are moving, whether high or low

sixth.title: ETF
sixth.text: Exchange Traded Fund, are investment funds that replicate the results of the chosen area, whether in variable income or fixed income. There is no decision making on the part of managers, just the identical copy of the result of a set of assets . Widely used to facilitate investments in various assets with lower rates.

seventh.title: CFD
seventh.text: Contract For Difference, is a financial instrument used to invest in shares, commodities and various other markets, without the need to hold the assets, used on a large scale for its leverage and liquidity (24 hours a day)

eighth.title: Futures market
eighth.text: Tools used to protect the price of the asset. They guarantee the sale or purchase of some physical asset for financial settlement, thus avoiding losses for producers of goods for consumption or other purposes that can anticipate their prices and thus have a predictability that makes planning easier.
